Only reason I mention the subs is that "Dothraki" is a fake language made for the show; this isn't the case of looking for Russian or Spanish.  I thought they were hardcoded from the studio, but I guess on the DVD they are separate to allow for other language.  Not sure the sub scene would be picking those up.

As far as Ep 7, I had tried VLC, MPlayer, and Perian (Quicktime), all of which choked, so figured it was the file.  It's only the last 3 min or so.  If I figure out the subs, maybe I'll pull these again.

Beyond that, the quality is excellent.  Long time fan of Honcho's releases.
